item.title: 3dsmax in virtualbox on Linux.
item.description: As you might have guessed I’m a linux fan, and I use it as much as possible. Sadly 3dsmax has not been ported to Linux and I do not see any signs of it happening any time soon either. So the last couple of days I’ve been setting up a proper VM for my development tools including 3dsmax. It works fine, I run windows 10, and 3dsmax 2015\2016 with visual studio 2013.
